title: HELP
body:
are we allowed to gift chromas? I cant find the place to gift chromas. my friend gifted me one in september.
plz help

thanks

replies.body: Chromas aren't currently giftable, but there may be another way.  It is possible to gift RP, which your friend can use to obtain a chroma themselves.  I hope that helps!
i can choose any amount of rp to gift my friend?
